Name: Seek Hearts
About the game: With questions swirling in his mind about why he was created and by who, Izen sets out on a journey to discover his origins. However, as he and those with him pursue answers to this mystery, they fail to notice a shadow creeping up upon them with the intent to stop them dead in their tracks... Features Upgrade Izen's abilities with arm/leg parts, core and chips! Activate the armament drive and fight with the support of fairies! Add a little spice to life with titles! Free arrangement of battle speed and encounter rates! Get easy items from fairies that hide in stockings! Loads of extra content including a battle arena and more!
Meta Title: Seek Hearts: Dec 3, 2019, Exe Create Inc. and Full Overview
